original: @269a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @269a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i ma h'a k'a la sto tra /
analyzed: shr'i ma h'a k'a la sto tra /
translated: Shri Mahakalastotra

original: bod skad du /üîΩdpal nag po chen po la bstod pa /
analyzed: bod skad du / dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa /
translated: In Tibetan:üîΩPraise of Glorious Mahakala

original: dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Glorious Mahakala!

original: h'um srin po'i gzugs kyis gdug pa can //üîΩtshar gcod byang chub @269b sems dpa' ste //
analyzed: h'um srin po'i gzugs kyis gdug pa can // tshar gcod byang chub @269b sems dpa' ste //
translated: With the form of a rakshasa, you subdue the wicked,

original: grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig byed pa'i //
analyzed: grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig byed pa'i //
translated: A bodhisattva who brings about the destruction of the three-storied city,üîΩYou are the fierce one,

original: gtum po khyod la bdag bstod do //
analyzed: gtum po khyod la bdag bstod do //
translated: To you, I offer praise!

original: mdog nag gzugs thung gzi brjid can //
analyzed: mdog nag gzugs thung gzi brjid can //
translated: Dark-hued, short in stature, yet majestic,

original: gdug pa tshar gcod gri gug g-yas //
analyzed: gdug pa tshar gcod gri gug g-yas //
translated: In your right hand, you hold a flaying knife that subdues the wicked,

original: g-yon pa gdug pa'i khrag bkang snod //
analyzed: g-yon pa gdug pa'i khrag bkang snod //
translated: In your left, a skull-cup filled with the blood of the wicked,

original: thod phreng can la bdag bstod do //
analyzed: thod phreng can la bdag bstod do //
translated: To you, the one with a garland of skulls, I offer praise!

original: khros pas zhabs brdabs sa gzhi g-yo //
analyzed: khros pas zhabs brdabs sa gzhi g-yo //
translated: With your foot, you stamp on the earth, causing it to shake,

original: 'jigs pa'i gad mos ri rab bsgyel //
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i gad mos ri rab bsgyel //
translated: With your terrifying laughter, you topple Mount Meru,

original: dam tshig nyams pa'i snying 'byin pa //
analyzed: dam tshig nyams pa'i snying 'byin pa //
translated: You rip out the hearts of those who violate their commitments,

original: dam tshig can la bdag bstod do //
analyzed: dam tshig can la bdag bstod do //
translated: To you, the one who keeps his commitments, I offer praise!

original: h'um zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa //üîΩgri gug thod pa lag na 'dzin //
analyzed: h'um zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa // gri gug thod pa lag na 'dzin //
translated: With a single face and two hands,üîΩYou hold a flaying knife and a skull-cup,

original: ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil //
analyzed: ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil //
translated: Your hair, black as a raven, stands on end,

original: spyan gsum me yi mdog 'dra ba //
analyzed: spyan gsum me yi mdog 'dra ba //
translated: Your three eyes are like the color of fire.

original: mche ba zla ba tshes pa 'dra //
analyzed: mche ba zla ba tshes pa 'dra //
translated: Your fangs are like the crescent moon.

original: thod pa'i phreng bas do shal byas //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng bas do shal byas //
translated: You wear a garland of skulls as a necklace.

original: gsus khyim che la 'phyang ba po //
analyzed: gsus khyim che la 'phyang ba po //
translated: Your large belly hangs down.

original: mi thung khros pa'i gzugs 'dra ba //üîΩ'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi //
analyzed: mi thung khros pa'i gzugs 'dra ba // 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi //
translated: You are like the wrathful form of a dwarf.üîΩYou are the one who has promised to protect

original: bstan ba srung bar zhal bzhes pa //
analyzed: bstan ba srung bar zhal bzhes pa //
translated: the teachings of the past, future, and present.

original: nag po khyod ni yin pa ste //
analyzed: nag po khyod ni yin pa ste //
translated: You are Black One,

original: gdug pa tshar gcod 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
analyzed: gdug pa tshar gcod 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
translated: the terrifying form that subdues the vicious.

original: dbu skra kham nag gyen brdzes pa //
analyzed: dbu skra kham nag gyen brdzes pa //
translated: Your black hair bristles upward,

original: steng gi lha tshogs 'jigs par byed //
analyzed: steng gi lha tshogs 'jigs par byed //
translated: terrifying the assembly of gods above.

original: spyan bgrad mche gtsigs ljags 'dril bas //
analyzed: spyan bgrad mche gtsigs ljags 'dril bas //
translated: With your bulging eyes, bared fangs, and rolled tongue,

original: bar gyi gdon tshogs bsdigs par byed //
analyzed: bar gyi gdon tshogs bsdigs par byed //
translated: you threaten the assembly of demons in the middle.

original: g-yas na gri gug bsnams pa ni //
analyzed: g-yas na gri gug bsnams pa ni //
translated: Holding a flaying knife in your right hand,

original: dgra bgegs 'dul zhing bdud mgo gcod //
analyzed: dgra bgegs 'dul zhing bdud mgo gcod //
translated: you subdue enemies and obstructors and behead Mara.

original: g-yon pas thod pa bsnams pa ni //
analyzed: g-yon pas thod pa bsnams pa ni //
translated: Holding a skull cup in your left hand,

original: gnod sems can gyi khrag bkang gsol //
analyzed: gnod sems can gyi khrag bkang gsol //
translated: you drink the blood of malicious beings.

original: khros pa'i zhabs gnyis brdab pa yis //
analyzed: khros pa'i zhabs gnyis brdab pa yis //
translated: With your two wrathful feet stomping,

original: gnod sems can gyi lus la nyed //
analyzed: gnod sems can gyi lus la nyed //
translated: you crush the bodies of malicious beings.

original: khyod kyis thub pa'i bstan pa srungs //
analyzed: khyod kyis thub pa'i bstan pa srungs //
translated: Protect the teachings of the Buddha.

original: rnal 'byor pa yi bar chad srungs //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yi bar chad srungs //
translated: Guard against obstacles for yogis.

original: chos dang dpal 'byor rgyas par mdzod //
analyzed: chos dang dpal 'byor rgyas par mdzod //
translated: Expand the Dharma and wealth.

original: lus dang grib ma bzhin du 'grogs //
analyzed: lus dang grib ma bzhin du 'grogs //
translated: Accompany like a body and its shadow.

original: dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa slob dpon bram ze mchog sred kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa slob dpon bram ze mchog sred kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The praise of glorious MahƒÅkƒÅla composed by the master Brahmin Vararuci is complete.
